import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./contact.css" const Contact = () => { const [inputvalue, setinputvalue] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", phone: "", message: "" }); console.log(inputvalue) const getvalue = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setinputvalue(() => { return { ...inputvalue, [name]: value } }) } const [spin, setSpin] = useState(true) setTimeout(() => { setSpin(false) }, 1500) return ( <> { spin ?
